print('hello')
>> hello

Installation Instructions¶

If you have git and pip installed, use this:

pip install virtualenv virtualenv env source env/bin/activate

git clone https://github.com/Amrithasuresh/BPPRC.git cd bpprc pip install -r requirements.txt python manage.py migrate python manage.py runserver
